description: Returns the physical offset of this <%=class_name%> from the center of the <%=tile%> they're standing on.
**Positive** X values mean it has been moved to the *right*, **negative** X values mean it has been moved to the *left*.
**Positive** Y values mean it has been moved *downwards*, **negative** Y values mean it has been moved *upwards*.
return_value_desc: The offset of this <%=class_name%>. `X` : horizontal offset, `Y` : vertical offset.

text: This value is altered by movement, representing their physical position between <%=tile%>s.
